span.strong: Fun things for Parents & Kids to do while at home.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial;

span.strong:
Due to the COVID-19.
Cosas divertidas que los padres y niños pueden hacer mientras
están en casa debido al COVID-19.

div.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;;font-size: 18px;;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;

span.span: Read to them or have a them read a book to you.

br.span: Then talk about what you have read.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;
div.span: Léales o pídales que le lean un libro.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;
div.span: Luego hablen sobre lo que han leído.

p.style: padding: 0px; margin: 0px; font-size: 1em; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; line-height: 1.68rem; box-sizing: border-box;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;;font-size: 18px;;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

br.span: Pick your favorite board game, make some snacks.
Then sit down and play for some family fun.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

div.span: Elijan su juego de mesa favorito, preparen algunos bocadillos.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

div.span: Luego siéntense y jueguen para divertirse en familia.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;;font-size: 18px;;color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

br.span: Pick a place in your yard and plant a garden.
Search the internet for plants that grow in your area.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial; text-align: center;
div.span: And as a family keep your garden growing.

span.style: box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12pt;

div.span: Escojan un lugar en su patio y planten un jardín.

div.p:
For Questions or suggestion on website please contact: districtwebmaster@laferiaisd.org.
La Feria ISD does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, or disability in providing education services, activities, and programs, including vocational programs, in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972; section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.
If you have difficulty accessing anything on this website because of a disability, please contact Cynthia.torres@laferiaisd.org or call at (956) 797-8300.
